price: Mi smo ti objavili sedam ajeta, koji se ponavljaju, i Kur’an ti veličanstveni objavljujemo.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَٰكَ سَبۡعٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمَثَانِي وَٱلۡقُرۡءَانَ ٱلۡعَظِيمَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynāka sabʿan mina al-mathānī wal-qur'āna al-ʿaẓīma
